rules_text:
Exile any number of nonland permanents you control. For as long as they remain exiled, you may cast them without paying their mana cost.
Exile Paradoxical Mastery.
flavor_text:
[i]“Mana is like clay in a trained wizard's hands.You will not learn to cast spells in my class, you will learn how to shape them to your will.”
—Mia, Strict Mentor[/i]
